card.name: A Blazing Storm of Metal! [BT5-103]
card.text:
[Main] Until the end of your opponent's next turn, all of your Digimon with ＜Reboot＞ get +1000 DP and ＜Blocker＞ (At blocker timing, by suspending this Digimon, it becomes the attack target).
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Your opponent's Digimon can't attack players for the turn. Then, add this card to your hand.

card.name: A Delicate Plan [BT3-097]
card.text:
[Main] 1 of your Digimon gains "[Security] effects on Option cards checked by this Digimon don't activate" for the turn.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Add this card to the hand.

card.name: A New World [P-021]

Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Add this card to your hand.

card.name: Absolute Blast [BT5-097]
card.text:
[Main] Trash the bottom digivolution card of 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, return 1 of your opponent's Digimon with no digivolution cards to the bottom of its owner's deck.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

card.name: Achillesmon [BT10-040]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 3 Evolution Color: Yellow Evolution Level: 5
[When Digivolving] If you have 2 or fewer security cards, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞ (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack). [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If you have 3 or more security cards, 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -5000 DP for the turn. If you have 3 or fewer security cards, gain 2 memory.

card.name: Achillesmon [BT16-047]
card.text:

[All Turns] When this Digimon deletes an opponent's Digimon in battle, if you have 3 or more security cards, trash the top card of your opponent's security stack. If you have 3 or fewer, gain 2 memory.
Alternative Effect: [Digivolve] Lv.5 w/[Pulsemon] in its text: Cost 3

card.text:

card.text: [Main] You may suspend this Digimon to Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Place 1 [ADR-02 Searcher] among them under 1 of your [Mother D-Reaper]'s as its bottom digivolution card. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.

Source Effect: [Opponent's Turn] When any of your opponent's Digimon attack, you may play 1 [ADR-01 Jeri] from this Digimon's digivolution cards without paying the cost. If you played, you may change the attack target to the Digimon played by this effect.

card.name: Ai & Mako [EX2-065]
card.text:
[Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 memory or less, set your memory to 3. [Your Turn] When you attack with a Digimon, you may suspend this Tamer to trash the top card of your deck. Then, if the attacking Digimon is [Beelzemon], you may digivolve it into a [Beelzemon: Blast Mode] in your trash for a digivolution cost of 3.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: Ai & Mako [ST14-11]
card.text:
[On Play] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 Digimon card with the [Evil]/[Wizard]/[Demon Lord] trait among them to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. [Your Turn] When one of your Digimon digivolves into a purple Digimon, by suspending this Tamer, return 1 card from your hand to the top of your deck and gain 1 memory.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: Ai & Mako [BT19-088]
card.text:
[Start of Your Main Phase] If your opponent has a Digimon, gain 1 memory. [Main] If you have 20 or more cards in your trash, by suspending this Tamer, 1 of your [Impmon] may digivolve into [Beelzemon] in the hand or trash for a digivolution cost of 4, ignoring its digivolution requirements.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: Airdramon [LM-009]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 2 Evolution Color: Green Evolution Level: 3
[Your Turn] When a card with [Angoramon] in its text would be played or one of your Digimon would digivolve into such a card, by suspending this Digimon, reduce the play or digivolution cost by 2. [Your Turn] When this Digimon becomes suspended, 1 of your Digimon with [Angoramon] in its text gains ＜Rush＞ (This Digimon can attack the turn it comes into play) for the turn.

card.name: Airdramon [BT3-024]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 2 Evolution Color: Blue Evolution Level: 3
[Security] At the end of the battle, play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: Airdramon [EX3-029]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 2
[On Play] Search your security stack, reveal 1 card from it, and add it to your hand. If it's a yellow card, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞ (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack). Then, shuffle your security stack.

card.name: Airdramon [BT15-059]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 2
Xros Requirements: [Digivolve] Lv.3 w/[SoC] trait: Cost 2
[On Play] [When Digivolving] By placing 1 [Marvin Jackson] from your hand as this Digimon's bottom digivolution card, ＜De-Digivolve 1＞ 1 of your opponent's Digimon (Trash the top card. You can't trash past level 3 cards).
Source Effect: ＜Reboot＞ (Unsuspend this Digimon during your opponent's unsuspend phase).
Alternative Effect: [Digivolve] Lv.3 w/[SoC] trait: Cost 2

card.name: Airdramon [BT19-032]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 2
[On Deletion] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gains ＜Security Attack -1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 fewer security card) until the end of their turn. Then, if you have 2 or fewer security cards, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞ (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack).
Source Effect: ＜Barrier＞ (When this Digimon would be deleted in battle, by trashing the top card of your security stack, prevent that deletion).

card.name: Airu Suzaki [BT12-091]
card.text:
[Start of Your Main Phase] By placing 1 Digimon card with ＜Save＞ in its text from your hand under this Tamer, 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -2000 DP for the turn. [Your Turn] When one of your Digimon would digivolve into a Digimon card with ＜Save＞ in its text, by suspending this Tamer and placing 1 card from under one of your Tamers as the bottom digivolution card of that Digimon, reduce the digivolution cost by 1.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: Ajatarmon [BT10-053]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 3
[Main] [Once Per Turn] By suspending 1 of your green Digimon, you may play 1 Digimon card with [Vegetation]/[Plant]/[Fairy] in one of its traits and 3000 DP or less from your hand without paying its memory cost.
Source Effect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When an effect suspends one of your Digimon, gain 1 memory.

card.name: Akari Hinomoto [BT10-089]
card.text:
[On Play] You may play 1 [Dorulumon] from your hand or from under one of your Tamers without paying its memory cost. [Your Turn] When you play a Digimon with the [Xros Heart] trait, by suspending this Tamer, ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck).
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: Akatorimon [BT15-010]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 2
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When one of your Digimon attacks a player, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less.

card.name: Akihiro Kurata [BT13-103]
card.text:
[Your Turn] When you would play a card with [Belphemon] in its name, by deleting 1 of your Digimon with [Gizmon] in its name, reduce the play cost by the play cost of the deleted Digimon. [End of Opponent's Turn] [Once Per Turn] ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck) and trash 1 card in your hand. Then, by placing this Tamer under 1 of your Digimon with [Belphemon] in its name as its bottom digivolution card, delete 1 of your opponent's level 6 Digimon.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: Akiho Rindou [BT11-089]
card.text:
[On Play] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 red Digimon card with the [Vaccine] trait among them to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. [Your Turn] When you play a red Digimon with [Avian]/[Bird]/[Beast]/[Animal]/[Sovereign] in one of its traits (other than [Sea Animal] trait), by an effect, by suspending this Tamer, that Digimon gains ＜Rush＞ (This Digimon can attack the turn it comes into play) for the turn.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: Aldamon [BT4-016]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 3 Evolution Color: Red Evolution Level: 4
＜Security Attack +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card). [Your Turn] While this Digimon's digivolution cards include a Digimon card with the [Hybrid] trait or a red Tamer card, it gets +4000 DP.

card.name: Aldamon [BT7-014]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 3
When one of your Digimon with a Tamer card in its digivolution cards would digivolve into this card in your hand, reduce the memory cost of the digivolution by 2. [When Digivolving] If a card with the [Hybrid] trait is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, this Digimon gets +4000 DP for the turn.
Source Effect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has the [Hybrid]/[Ten Warriors] trait, it doesn't activate [Security] effects on Option cards it checks.

card.name: Aldamon [BT12-015]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 3
[Hand] [Main] By placing 1 [Agunimon] and 1 [BurningGreymon] from your trash under 1 of your [Takuya Kanbara]s in any order, digivolve into this card as if the Tamer is a level 4 red Digimon for the digivolution cost. [On Deletion] Return 1 [Takuya Kanbara] from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Aldamon [BT17-014]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 4
[Hand] [Main] By placing 1 [Agunimon] and [BurningGreymon] from your trash under 1 of your [Takuya Kanbara]s, digivolve it into this card as if that card is a level 4 red Digimon for a digivolution cost of 3. [When Digivolving] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 6000 DP or less.
Source Effect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has the [Hybrid]/[Ten Warriors] trait, it doesn't activate [Security] effects on option cards it checks.

card.name: Alice McCoy [EX2-064]
card.text:
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When one of your Digimon would digivolve from level 5 to level 6, you may delete 1 of your Digimon to reduce the digivolution cost by 3.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: All Delete [BT5-110]
card.text:
[Main] You may return 1 of your Digimon with [Omnimon] in its name to its owner's hand to delete all Digimon and Tamers. Trash all of the digivolution cards of the Digimon you returned with this effect.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Add this card to the hand.

card.name: Alphamon [BT6-111]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 3 Evolution Color: Black Evolution Level: 5
[Security] At the end of the battle, add this card to your hand. Then, if a Digimon with the [Royal Knight]/[X Antibody] trait is in play, up to 12 of your opponent's Digimon can't attack players for the turn. [When Attacking] You may pay up to 5 memory. If you do, this Digimon gets +1000 DP for the turn for each memory paid. [End of Attack] Gain 2 memory.

card.name: Alphamon [BT9-066]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 3 Evolution Color: Black
[When Digivolving] Place 1 card with the [X Antibody] trait from your trash under this Digimon as its bottom digivolution card. [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When an effect places a digivolution card under this Digimon, ＜De-Digivolve 1＞ 1 of your opponent's Digimon (Trash the top card. You can't trash past level 3 cards).

card.name: Alphamon [BT13-075]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 4
[On Play] [When Digivolving] By placing 1 Digimon card with the [X Antibody] trait or the [Royal Knight] trait from your trash under this Digimon as its bottom digivolution card, all of your opponent's Digimon with a play cost of 10 or higher can't attack players until the end of your opponent's turn. [All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When this Digimon would leave the battle area by an effect, by returning 1 Digimon card with the [X Antibody] trait or the [Royal Knight] trait from this Digimon's digivolution cards to the bottom of your deck, prevent it from leaving play.

card.name: Alphamon: Ouryuken [BT9-111]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 7 Evolution Color: Black
Xros Requirements: [Digivolve] [Alphamon] w/[Ouryumon] digivolution card: Cost 3
[When Digivolving] Delete all of your opponent's Digimon with the highest play cost. [End of Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] You may return up to 7 non-Digi-Egg cards with the [X Antibody] trait from this Digimon's digivolution cards to the bottom of your deck in any order, if you do, gain 1 memory for each card returned.
Alternative Effect: [Digivolve] [Alphamon] w/[Ouryumon] digivolution card: Cost 3

card.name: Altea [BT20-086]
card.text:
[Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 memory or less, set your memory to 3. [Start of Your Main Phase] By placing 1 black Digimon card with the [Cyborg]/[Machine] trait with a play cost of 4 or less from your hand or trash at the bottom of your Digimon with such trait, flip your opponent's top face down security card face up.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: Amber Memory Boost! [LM-035]
card.text:
This card may also have its color requirements met by purple. [Main] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 yellow or purple Digimon card among them to the hand. Return the rest to the bottom of deck. Then, place this card in the battle area. [Main] ＜Delay＞ (After this card is placed, by trashing it the next turn or later, activate the effect below.) ・Gain 2 memory.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Place this card in the battle area.

card.name: Ame-no-Ohabari [EX4-071]
card.text:
[Main] By deleting 1 of your Digimon, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon whose level is less than or equal to that Digimon. If one of your Digimon with [Ravemon] in its name was deleted by this effect, at the end of your opponent's turn, play 1 [Ravemon] from your trash without paying the cost.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Delete 1 of your opponent’s Digimon with the lowest level.

card.name: Amphimon [P-089]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 3 Evolution Color: Blue Evolution Level: 5
[When Digivolving] You may trash up to 3 blue cards from your hand. For each card trashed by this effect, you may trash 1 card under 1 of your opponent's Digimon or Tamers. Then, 1 of your opponent's Digimon or Tamers without cards under it can't suspend until the end of your opponent's turn. [Opponent's Turn] [Once Per Turn] When an opponent's Digimon attacks, end that attack by returning 3 cards with [Jellymon] in their text from your trash to the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Amphimon [LM-005]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 3 Evolution Color: Blue Evolution Level: 5
[Hand] [Counter] ＜Blast Digivolve＞ (Your Digimon may digivolve into this card without paying the cost). [On Play] [When Digivolving] You may trash up to 4 blue cards in your hand. For each one, trash any 1 card under your opponent's Digimon or Tamers. Then, return 1 of their Digimon or Tamers without cards under it to the hand. [When Attacking] By returning 3 cards with [Jellymon] in their texts from your trash to the bottom of the deck, this Digimon gains ＜Security Attack +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card) for the turn.
Source Effect: Ace Overflow ＜-4＞ (As this card would move from the field or from under a card to another area, lose 4 memory.).

card.name: Amphimon [RB1-016]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 4 Evolution Color: Blue Evolution Level: 5
[When Digivolving] [When Attacking] You may trash up to 2 blue cards in your hand. For each one, trash any 1 card under your opponent's Digimon or Tamers. Then, you may return 1 of your opponent’s Digimon with no digivolution cards to the bottom of the deck. [All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When one of your blue Digimon would be deleted, by returning 3 cards with [Jellymon] in their texts from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order, prevent its deletion.

card.name: Analog Youth [EX1-066]
card.text:
[On Play] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 Digimon card among them to your hand. Trash the remaining cards. [All Turns] When one of your level 5 or higher Digimon with digivolution cards is deleted, you may suspend this Tamer. If you do, gain 1 memory, then hatch 1 Digi-Egg card to an empty space in your Breeding Area.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: Analogman [BT11-092]
card.text:
[Start of Your Main Phase] By trashing 1 level 5 card with the [Cyborg] trait in your hand, gain 1 memory and ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck). [Opponent's Turn] When an opponent's Digimon attacks a player, by suspending this Tamer, switch the target of attack to 1 of your level 6 Digimon with the [Machine] trait.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: Ancient Guardian Deity [BT17-094]
card.text:
While you have a Tamer or a Digimon with the [Hybrid] trait, you may ignore this card's color requirements. [Main] You may return 1 Digimon card with the [Hybrid] trait or [Ten Warriors] trait from your trash to the hand. Then, you may play 1 Digimon card with the [Ten Warriors] trait or 1 Tamer card with inherited effects from your hand with the play cost reduced by 4.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] You may play 1 Tamer card with an inherited effect from your hand or trash without paying the cost. Then, add this card to the hand.

card.name: AncientBeetlemon [BT7-054]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 5
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When one of your Digimon with the [Ten Warriors]/[Hybrid] trait deletes an opponent's Digimon in battle and survives, trash the top card of your opponent's security stack. [On Deletion] You may play 1 green level 4 or lower Digimon card with the [Hybrid] trait from your hand without paying its memory cost.

card.name: AncientBeetlemon [BT18-072]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 3
Xros Requirements: [Digivolve] Lv.5 w/[Insectoid] trait: Cost 3
[On Play] [When Digivolving] ＜De-Digivolve 2＞ 2 of your opponent's Digimon (Trash up to 2 cards from the top. You can't trash past level 3 cards). [All Turns] When this Digimon would leave the battle area, you may play 1 level 4 or lower Digimon card with the [Insectoid]/[Hybrid] trait from this Digimon's digivolution cards without paying the cost. [Rule] Trait: Has the [Insectoid] type.
Alternative Effect: [Digivolve] Lv.5 w/[Insectoid] trait: Cost 3

card.name: AncientGarurumon [BT4-114]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 5 Evolution Color: Blue Evolution Level: 5
[When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] Unsuspend up to 2 of your Digimon with [Garurumon] in their names (other than [KendoGarurumon]) or [Hybrid] trait. [On Deletion] You may play 1 blue level 4 or below Digimon card with the [Hybrid] trait from your hand without paying its memory cost.

card.name: AncientGarurumon [BT17-028]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 4
Xros Requirements: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -3] [Lobomon] x [KendoGarurumon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.
[On Play] [When Digivolving] Return 1 of your opponent's Digimon with the lowest level to the hand. [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When an effect adds cards to your or your opponent's hand, your opponent adds the top card of their security stack to the hand. [On Deletion] You may return 1 Tamer card and 1 [Hybrid] trait Digimon card from your trash to the hand. Then, you may play 1 Tamer card from your hand without paying the cost.
Alternative Effect: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -3] [Lobomon] x [KendoGarurumon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.

card.name: AncientGreymon [BT4-113]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 5 Evolution Color: Red Evolution Level: 5
[Your Turn] For each Digimon card in this Digimon's digivolution cards with [Greymon] in its name (other than [DoruGreymon]/[BurningGreymon]/[DexDoruGreymon]) or [Hybrid] trait, this Digimon gains ＜Security Attack +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card). [On Deletion] You may play 1 red level 4 or below Digimon card with the [Hybrid] trait from your hand without paying its cost.

card.name: AncientGreymon [BT17-017]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 4
Xros Requirements: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -3] [Agunimon] x [BurningGreymon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.
＜Security Attack +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card). [On Play] [When Digivolving] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with as much or less DP than this Digimon. [On Deletion] Return 1 Tamer card and 1 [Hybrid] trait Digimon card from your trash to the hand. Then, you may play 1 Tamer card from your hand without paying the cost.
Alternative Effect: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -3] [Agunimon] x [BurningGreymon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.

card.name: AncientKazemon [BT7-042]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 5
[Opponent's Turn] While a card with the [Hybrid] trait is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, all of your Security Digimon get +4000 DP. [On Deletion] You may play 1 yellow level 4 or lower card with the [Hybrid] trait from your hand without paying its memory cost.

card.name: AncientKazemon [BT18-054]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 3
Xros Requirements: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -2] [Kazemon] x [Zephyrmon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.
[On Play] [When Digivolving] Suspend all of your opponent's Digimon with as much or less DP as this Digimon. None of your opponent's Digimon can unsuspend until the end of their turn. [All Turns] When this Digimon would leave the battle area, you may play 1 level 4 or lower Digimon card the [Hybrid] trait or [Avian]/[Bird]/[Fairy] in one of its traits from this Digimon's digivolution cards without paying the cost.
Alternative Effect: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -2] [Kazemon] x [Zephyrmon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.

card.name: AncientMegatheriummon [BT7-030]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 5
[When Digivolving] For each card with the [Hybrid] trait in this Digimon's digivolution cards, trash 1 digivolution card from the bottom of each of your opponent's Digimon. Then, for each Digimon your opponent has with no digivolution cards, ＜Draw 2＞ (Draw 2 cards from your deck). [On Deletion] You may play 1 blue level 4 or lower Digimon card with the [Hybrid] trait from your hand without paying its memory cost.

card.name: AncientMegatheriummon [BT18-028]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 3
Xros Requirements: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -2] [Kumamon] x [Korikakumon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.
[On Play] [When Digivolving] Trash the bottom 2 digivolution cards of all of your opponent's Digimon. None of their Digimon with no digivolution cards can suspend until the end of their turn. [All Turns] When this Digimon would leave the battle area, you may play 1 level 4 or lower Digimon card with the [Mammal]/[Ice-Snow]/[Hybrid] trait from this Digimon's digivolution cards without paying the cost. [Rule] Trait: Has the [Ice-Snow] type.
Alternative Effect: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -2] [Kumamon] x [Korikakumon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.

card.name: AncientMermaimon [BT12-032]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 5
[When Digivolving] You may play 1 blue Digimon card with [Hybrid]/[Aqua]/[Sea Animal] in one of its traits, from 1 of your blue Digimon's digivolution cards without paying the cost. [On Deletion] You may play 1 blue level 4 or lower Digimon card with the [Hybrid] trait from your hand without paying the cost.

card.name: AncientMermaimon [BT18-029]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 4
Xros Requirements: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -2] [Lanamon] x [Calmaramon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.
[On Play] [When Digivolving] Return 1 of your opponent's level 4 or lower Digimon to the hand. For each of your other Digimon, add 1 to this effect's level maximum. [All Turns] When this Digimon would leave the battle area, you may return to the hand or play 1 level 4 or lower blue Digimon card from this Digimon's digivolution cards without paying the cost .
Alternative Effect: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -2] [Lanamon] x [Calmaramon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.

card.name: AncientSphinxmon [BT7-078]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 5
[When Digivolving] You may delete 1 of your Digimon with [Ten Warriors] or [Hybrid] trait to delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon whose level is less than or equal to the deleted Digimon's level. [On Deletion] You may play 1 purple level 4 or lower card with the [Hybrid] trait from your hand without paying its memory cost.

card.text:
Evolution Cost: 4
Xros Requirements: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -2] [Loweemon] or [Duskmon] x [KaiserLeomon] or [Velgrmon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.
[On Play] [When Digivolving] delete 1 of your opponent's unsuspended Digimon. [All Turns] When this Digimon would leave the battle area, you may play 1 level 4 or lower Digimon card with the [Dark Animal]/[Mythical Beast]/[Hybrid] trait from this Digimon's digivolution cards without paying the cost.
Alternative Effect: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -2] [Loweemon] or [Duskmon] x [KaiserLeomon] or [Velgrmon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.

card.name: AncientTroymon [BT6-054]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 5
[Opponent's Turn] When an opponent's Digimon attacks, suspend up to 2 of their Digimon without ＜Blocker＞. [On Deletion] You may play 1 green level 4 or lower Digimon card with the [Hybrid] trait from your hand without paying its memory cost.

card.name: AncientTroymon [BT18-055]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 4
Xros Requirements: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -2] [Arbormon] x [Petaldramon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.
[All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When an opponent's Digimon becomes suspended, trash their top security card. [All Turns] When this Digimon would leave the battle area, you may return to the hand or play 1 level 4 or lower green Digimon card from this Digimon's digivolution cards without paying the cost.
Alternative Effect: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -2] [Arbormon] x [Petaldramon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.

card.name: AncientVolcanomon [BT7-066]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 5
[When Digivolving] ＜De-Digivolve 3＞ 1 of your opponent's Digimon (Trash up to 3 cards from the top. You can't trash past level 3 cards) [On Deletion] You may play 1 black level 4 or lower card with the [Hybrid] trait from your hand without paying its memory cost.

card.name: AncientVolcanomon [BT18-017]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 4
Xros Requirements: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -2] [Grumblemon] x [Gigasmon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.
[On Play] [When Digivolving] Delete all of your opponent's Digimon with the lowest DP. [All Turns] When this Digimon would leave the battle area, you may return to the hand or play 1 level 4 or lower red Digimon card from this Digimon's digivolution cards without paying the cost.
Alternative Effect: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -2] [Grumblemon] x [Gigasmon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.

card.text:
Evolution Cost: 5
[Opponent's Turn] [Once Per Turn] When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Play 1 black card with a play cost of 6 or less among them without paying its memory cost. Trash the rest. [On Deletion] You may play 1 black level 4 or lower card with the [Hybrid] trait from your hand without paying its memory cost.

card.text:
Evolution Cost: 4
Xros Requirements: DigiXros Requirements [DigiXros -2] [Mercurymon] x [Sephirothmon] When you would play this card, you may place specified cards from your hand/battle area under it. Each placed card reduces the play cost.
[On Play] [When Digivolving] You may reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Play 1 black card with a play cost of 7 or less among them without paying the cost. Trash the rest. [All Turns] When this Digimon would leave the battle area, you may return to the hand or play 1 level 4 or lower black Digimon card from this Digimon's digivolution cards without paying the cost .

[All Turns] When this Digimon would leave the battle area, you may place up to 3 Digimon cards with the [Xros Heart] trait from this Digimon's digivolution cards under 1 of your Tamers. When you would play this card, by placing 1 [Shoutmon] as a digivolution card under this Digimon, reduce the cost by 1 and you may place cards in your trash as digivolution cards for a DigiXros. [Main] You may play 1 yellow or red Tamer card from your hand without paying for its memory cost. Then, 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -3000 DP for the turn for each yellow and/or red Tamers you have in play,
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

card.name: Super Eradication Attack [BT12-108]
card.text:
While you have a level 6 Digimon with the [Machine] trait in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements. [Main] Choose 1 of your Digimon with the [Machine]/[Cyborg] trait. Delete that Digimon and 1 of your opponent's Digimon with DP less than or equal to the chosen Digimon.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] By trashing 1 of your Digimon with the [Machine]/[Cyborg] trait from your hand, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with a play cost less than or equal to the trashed Digimon's play cost.

card.name: Super Shocker [BT15-094]
card.text:

Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect. Then, add this card to the hand.

card.name: Supreme Cannon [BT5-096]
card.text:
Evolution Color: Blue
[Main] Return all of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less to their owners' hands. If you have a Digimon in play with [Garurumon]/[Omnimon] in its name (other than [KendoGarurumon]), return all of your opponent's Digimon with 5000 DP or less to their owners' hands instead.

card.name: Supreme Connection! [BT15-096]
card.text:
[Main] Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Among them, add 1 card with the [Machine]/[Cyborg] trait to the hand and trash 1 such card. Return the rest to the top of the deck. Then, place this card in the battle area. [Main] ＜Delay＞ (After this card is placed, by trashing it the next turn or later, activate the effect below.) ・You may play 1 level 5 or higher Digimon card with the [Machine]/[Cyborg] trait from your hand with the play cost reduced by 3.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Among them, add 1 card with the [Machine]/[Cyborg] trait to the hand and trash 1 such card. Return the rest to the top of the deck. Then, place this card in the battle area.

card.name: Susanoomon [BT7-112]
card.text:
Evolution Cost: 7 Evolution Color: All
By placing 10 Tamer cards and/or cards with the [Hybrid] trait from your hand and/or trash at the bottom of your deck in any order, you may digivolve this card from your hand onto one of your Tamers as if the Tamer is a level 6 Digimon. ＜Security Attack +2＞ (This Digimon checks 2 additional security cards) [When Digivolving] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon.

card.name: Susanoomon [BT18-102]
card.text:

[Hand] [Counter] ＜Blast Digivolve＞ (Your Digimon may digivolve into this card without paying the cost). [When Digivolving] [When Attacking] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 10000 DP or less. For each color in this Digimon's digivolution cards, add 2000 to this DP deletion effect's maximum. [When Attacking] By placing up to 5 Tamer cards from this Digimon's digivolution cards as your bottom security cards, trash opponent's top security cards for each card placed by this effect. [Rule] Trait: Has the [Hybrid] form.
Source Effect: Ace Overflow ＜-5＞ (As this card would move from the field or from under a card to another area, lose 5 memory.)
Alternative Effect: [Digivolve] [Takuya Kanbara]/[Koji Minamoto] w/10 [Hybrid] trait cards under it: Cost 6

[Main] Choose 1 of your Digimon. Return 1 of your opponent's suspended Digimon with DP less than or equal to the chosen Digimon to its owner's hand. Then, by returning the top card of one of your [Leopardmon: Leopard Mode] to hand, unsuspend all of your Digimon.
Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, add this card to your hand.

card.name: Wadatsumi Purification [BT19-092]
card.text:

Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

card.name: Waltz's End [BT13-108]
card.text:

Source Effect: Security Effect [Security] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with the lowest play cost.

card.name: Wanyamon [P-148]

Then, it may attack. [When Attacking] If you have a Tamer, this Digimon gains ＜Security Attack +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card) and ＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would), for the turn.
